data.text: I want to turn a press release to a structured JSON document that looks like this:

Include all relevant information about the event in the description text, separate lines with \n if necessary. Don't repeat information like time, date and registration requirements in the description.
Make sure that you extract relevant contact information and include it in the "registration" field if registration is needed.

Timestamps without timezones can be assumed to be in Europe/Stockholm. All timestamps should be in the RFC3339 format with timezone offset "2025-10-01T10:00:00.000+02:00" or zulu time ""2025-10-01T08:00:00.000Z".
If you think that the event looks important you can change the newsvalue to 4.
There can be up to tree category links, but only be one section link.
Section and category UUIDs must match exactly.
Sections cannot be used as categories, and categories cannot be used as sections.
